jeopardy.category: THE BEST NEW THING IN THE WORLD

clues.category: THE BEST NEW THING IN THE WORLD
clues.clue: (Rachel Maddow delivers the clue.)  In 1955 the best new thing in the world was Jonas Salk's vaccine for this, which saved hundreds of thousands of children from contracting the disease

clues.category: THE BEST NEW THING IN THE WORLD
clues.clue: (Rachel Maddow delivers the clue.)  Around 1455 the best new thing in the world was movable type, used in a 42-line Bible produced by this German printer
